About The Department of Tourism Management was established in 1999, dedicated to the motto of excellence and service. The Department is committed for the overall development of an individual through academic excellence, professional competence, personal, interpersonal and societal skills. Christ University became the premier educational institute in Karnataka. With a focus on Greater Academia and stronger Industry Relations, the Discipline gives emphasis on Research and development. The Discipline of Tourism Management is part of School of Business and Management, Christ University – Bannerghatta Road Campus, Bengaluru. The department offers BBA (Marketing and Tourism) PGDBA (Tourism and Logistics Management) and PhD in Tourism. The School of Business and Management is an IATA/UFTAA Authorized Training Centre for international travel and tourism training programmes. Driven with a strong and sound set of core values, the Discipline has always endeavored to empower students to face the challenges in the rapidly growing travel, tourism and hospitality industry. The Discipline imparts training in marketing and tourism management and related areas. It provides opportunities to students to connect with various Bodies and Associations within the tourism and hospitality in such a way that they are equipped professionally in the vocation of marketing and tourism. The Discipline also undertakes educational programmes and organizes courses of study, lectures, seminars, workshops, symposia and conferences to prepare the students to meet the requirements of sectors. Read more... × About The Department of Tourism Management was established in 1999, dedicated to the motto of excellence and service. The Department is committed for the overall development of an individual through academic excellence, professional competence, personal, interpersonal and societal skills. Christ University became the premier educational institute in Karnataka. With a focus on Greater Academia and stronger Industry Relations, the Discipline gives emphasis on Research and development. The Discipline of Tourism Management is part of School of Business and Management, Christ University – Bannerghatta Road Campus, Bengaluru. The department offers BBA (Marketing and Tourism) PGDBA (Tourism and Logistics Management) and PhD in Tourism. The School of Business and Management is an IATA/UFTAA Authorized Training Centre for international travel and tourism training programmes. Driven with a strong and sound set of core values, the Discipline has always endeavored to empower students to face the challenges in the rapidly growing travel, tourism and hospitality industry. The Discipline imparts training in marketing and tourism management and related areas. It provides opportunities to students to connect with various Bodies and Associations within the tourism and hospitality in such a way that they are equipped professionally in the vocation of marketing and tourism. The Discipline also undertakes educational programmes and organizes courses of study, lectures, seminars, workshops, symposia and conferences to prepare the students to meet the requirements of sectors. Overview The BBA in Marketing and Tourism at Christ University, Bangalore, is a dynamic program designed to equip students with specialized expertise in marketing, tourism management, and business strategy. Offered as both a three-year degree and a four-year Honours/Honours with Research program, it blends core business fundamentals with industry-relevant courses, ensuring a well-rounded education. The program follows a learner-centered approach (LCA) that emphasizes experiential learning, critical thinking, and real-world application. Through industrial collaborations, internships, live projects, and student-led initiatives, learners gain practical exposure to the evolving landscapes of tourism, hospitality, and digital marketing. The curriculum includes specialized courses such as Luxury Brand Management, Experiential Tourism, and Destination Planning, preparing students to tackle industry challenges with innovative solutions. A distinctive feature of this program is its strong industry interface and research-driven approach. The Honours with Research track encourages students to explore emerging trends and contribute to academic and industry advancements through faculty-guided projects. With a focus on sustainable tourism, smart tourism innovations, and strategic marketing, students develop critical analytical skills and an entrepreneurial mindset. Hands-on learning is further enriched through field visits, tourism projects, and event planning simulations, fostering leadership, project management, and business acumen. Graduates emerge as versatile professionals, well-prepared for careers in destination management, tourism marketing, aviation, event planning, and hospitality consulting. By bridging the gap between academic rigor and industry relevance, the program nurtures future leaders and change-makers in the global tourism and marketing landscape Vision Our vision is to nurture future leaders through academic excellence, innovative research, and a commitment to service, shaping a sustainable and inclusive global tourism landscape. Mission Department of Tourism Management is a platform to develop responsible leaders to make effective interventions in society through personal and professional excellence. Offered Campuses Bangalore BRC Message from the HOD Dr Rashmi Rai hod.tourismstudies.bgr@christuniversity.in Greetings from the Department of Tourism! It gives me immense pleasure to welcome you to our vibrant and dynamic department, where learning meets real-world experience to shape the future leaders of the tourism and hospitality industry. The Tourism sector continues to be one of the fastest-growing industries globally, offering diverse opportunities in travel, hospitality, cultural heritage, event management, sustainable tourism, and more. Our department is committed to providing a holistic and experiential learning environment that combines academic excellence with industry exposure and practical insights. We offer a comprehensive curriculum designed to equip our students with the skills, knowledge, and ethics necess Read more... × Message from the HOD Greetings from the Department of Tourism! It gives me immense pleasure to welcome you to our vibrant and dynamic department, where learning meets real-world experience to shape the future leaders of the tourism and hospitality industry. The Tourism sector continues to be one of the fastest-growing industries globally, offering diverse opportunities in travel, hospitality, cultural heritage, event management, sustainable tourism, and more. Our department is committed to providing a holistic and experiential learning environment that combines academic excellence with industry exposure and practical insights. We offer a comprehensive curriculum designed to equip our students with the skills, knowledge, and ethics necessary to thrive in today’s competitive world. Our faculty members bring in a wealth of experience and are dedicated to mentoring and nurturing talent. In addition to classroom learning, we emphasize internships, industry collaborations, field visits, and research to ensure our students graduate as competent professionals. We also take pride in fostering innovation and sustainability in tourism practices and encouraging our students to contribute positively to the community and the environment. I warmly invite you to explore the many opportunities our department has to offer and to become part of our mission to elevate tourism education and practice to new heights. Scholarly & Cultural Engagements Placements Collaboration Certifications and Membership Placements Collaboration Certifications and Membership Show More - Companies - International Collaborations Show More Department Activities Faculty Development Activities Seminars / Talks / Training Programs Awards & Recognitions Student Development Programs Consolidated Events Department Events Jan 23 2026 Greetings from the School of Business and Management, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BRC) The School of Business and Management, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BRC), CHRIST (Deemed to be University), is pleased to announce the Call for Papers for forthcoming International Conference on Inclusive and Resilient Pathways to achieve SDGs in Business and Tourism, scheduled for 23 and 24 January 2026 (IRPBT 2026) at Bangalore Bannerghatta Road Campus (BRC) IRPBT 2026 is a platform that invites students, scholars, researchers, and practitioners from diverse fields to explore key themes in sustainable business, regenerative tourism, technology-driven solutions, and inclusive growth. It aims to foster cross-sector dialogue and support SDG progress by aligning business and tourism with sustainability goals. In this direction, this conference deliberations will delve into eight major themes: • Sustainable Business and ESG Integration, • Sustainable Human Resource Management, • Technology-Driven Sustainability, • Sustainability Tourism and Cultural • Heritage Conservation, • Green and Regenerative Tourism, • Climate Action and Renewable Energy, • Social Equity, Gender and Inclusive Growth, • Sustainable Marketing and Consumer Behaviour. We welcome submissions from students, scholars, researchers, faculty members, and professionals across disciplines. Those who want to participate as delegates are also welcome. We invite you to submit papers that fall in any one of the themes in these lines. We expect original, unpublished theoretical, empirical, and experimental papers addressing, but not limited to the mentioned above topics For Registration and Sub themes, visit our website: irpbt2026.christuniversity.in The deadline for abstract submission is 16th August 2025. International Conference | Business | Tourism | SDGs Oct 09 2025 Dear Students and Colleagues, The Department of International Studies, Political Science and History, CHRIST (Deemed to be University), Bannerghatta Road Campus, is pleased to invite applications for the Policy Design Workshop 2025, to be held from 9–12 October 2025 at the Bannerghatta Road Campus, Bengaluru. This intensive, four-day workshop is designed for students, early-career researchers, and professionals passionate about evidence-based public policy and social equity. Participants will gain hands-on exposure to: Policy design frameworks and design thinking Monitoring and evaluation tools, including RCTs, DID, and RDD Health policy simulation and real-world case discussions Insights from expert resource persons from NLSIU, J-PAL South Asia, IGIDR, India Institute, and Games24x7 Registration Details: Residential Fee: ₹15,000 (includes accommodation, meals, kit, and access to all sessions) Non-Residential Fee: ₹10,000 (includes lunches, refreshments, and workshop materials) Registration Deadline: 30 September 2025 Registration Link: https://forms.gle/cUsH2JVZMypVrnqW6 Payment Link: https://feebook.southindianbank.com/FeeBookUser/userhome Please refer to the Brochure for further details For queries, contact: Ms. Pragya Yadav (Faculty Coordinator) – pragya.yadav@christuniversity.in Ayaan Dutta (Student Coordinator) – ayaan.dutta@bapsh.christuniversity.in, +91 9334045162 Aug 11 2025 The Research scholars forum, BRC is organizing a 10 day Intensive Publication Workshop. The workshop is designed to equip researchers, doctoral scholars and academicians with the advanced skills and strategic insights essential for publishing in high-impact and peer-reviewed journals indexed in Scopus, Web of Science and ABDC/FT50 lists with hands-on guidance and mentoring. The session offers a deep dive into the entire publication lifecycle with a specific focus on aligning research outputs with the rigorous standards and expectations of top-tier journals. Key components include identifying and evaluating appropriate target journals, adhering to strict publication ethics and crafting high-quality research questions with theoretical and practical relevance and developing well-structured manuscripts that meet editorial and reviewer standards. The workshop also addresses the nuances of responding to peer review feedback constructively and improving conceptual originality and methodological robustness. The Research scholars forum, BRC is organizing a 10 day Intensive Publication Workshop. The workshop is designed to equip researchers, doctoral scholars and academicians with the advanced skills and strategic insights essential for publishing in high-impact and peer-reviewed journals indexed in Scopus, Web of Science and ABDC/FT50 lists with hands-on guidance and mentoring. The session offers a deep dive into the entire publication lifecycle with a specific focus on aligning research outputs with the rigorous standards and expectations of top-tier journals. Key components include identifying and evaluating appropriate target journals, adhering to strict publication ethics and crafting high-quality research questions with theoretical and practical relevance and developing well-structured manuscripts that meet editorial and reviewer standards. The workshop also addresses the nuances of responding to peer review feedback constructively and improving conceptual originality and methodological robustness.

https://christuniversity.in/schools/scho.text: CHRIST UNIVERSITY School of Business and Management Programmes in School of Business and Management Business and Management Hotel Management Tourism Management Business and Management Hotel Management Vision Our Vision is to be an institution of excellence developing leaders serving enterprises and society globally. Mission Our Mission is to develop socially responsible business leaders with the spirit of inquiry through academic and industry engagement. Message from Dean Dr. Jain Mathew MCom, MPhil, PhD Email: dean.management@christuniversity.in Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri Read More × Message from Dean Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri campus – as well as at Pune-Lavasa and Delhi-NCR. Among business schools in India, we are unique in terms of the scale of operations, diversity and representation from all parts of India, as well as offering quality education at a competitive fee structure. Our hallmark is the experiential learning through live projects, internships, service learning, and holistic education through co-curricular and extra-curricular activities. In our MBA program, we provide experiential learning through cases from Harvard and other reputed sources. The curriculum includes research based assignments, and also provides an opportunity for self-learning – which supports the students in lifelong learning. External inputs from corporate executives is an integral part of the pedagogy, thus preparing the students for careers in the industry. Our strong alumni network is a valuable asset in this regard. Our syllabus is updated on an annual basis to stay current in a dynamic environment. The speciality of the School is the development of grounded individuals, with ethical sensitivity and a sense of social responsibility. The faculty – who have a blend of industry and academic experience - stay current through publishing regularly in Scopus indexed and other quality journals. I invite you to peruse the School of Business and Management’s webpages on the portal, which delineate the credentials of our faculty, as well as provide highlights of our activities. School Facilities In order to encourage the students to participate in departmental activities, our university gives access to students to make use of the multiple facilities provided in the campus. Research Facilities NewsLetter Magazine Journal Publication Collaboration Research Facilities NewsLetter Magazine Journal Publication Collaboration Ongoing Research Show More Never miss an update from the campus; we've got you covered. Show More Let loose your artistic self with the Christ magazines Show More Join the outstanding international academia with prestigious Christ journals Show More Faculty Publications Top academicians of Christ University contributing to academia Show More Collaboration Show More Cultural & Fests CONVERGEX - Transforming Visions, Shaping Futures Industry-led conclave, ConvergeX (An exclusive alumni event) SWAD Market Exhibition of Gourmet, Organic and Artisanal Products Arohana Skill Enhancement Competitions for School Students USHUS Annual Management Fest CONVERGEX - Transforming Visions, Shaping Futures SWAD Market Arohana USHUS CONVERGEX - Transforming Visions, Shaping Futures SWAD Market Arohana USHUS Testimonials Alumni Testimonials Alumni Journey of Excellence Anirudh R Gangavaram | BBA 2018 Assistant Commissioner, Indian Revenue Service (IRS) The journey at Christ was an amazing amalgamation of learning, growing, discovering my talent & networking with a very diverse group. From getting opportunities to participate in quizzes all across the country to honing one's leadership skills, and from academics to assignments, it had it all. A memorable experience indeed! Read More Vishrutha Amudan Geo-Marketer, Zoho Corporation I graduated from Christ University with a Bachelors in Business Administration, specialising in marketing and I am currently working with Zoho Corporation as a Geo-marketer. I remember being fascinated by the beaming energy of the campus as I stepped into the university for the very first time. Christ has something amazing to offer for everyone, what worked for me as a business student was the extensive business festing experience the university offered, sparking my interest in the field of marketing. I strongly believe that the holistic curriculum combined with the scope to explore co-curricular and extra-curricular interests has helped me groom myself into a more confident version of myself, getting me equipped for the 'world of work'. Read More Sathwik Maanthini Founder, Habbit and Homelyfit They say great leaders are not born but are made, and I strongly feel Christ Deemed to be a university is such a place which creates the perfect ambience and exposure that brings out the best of one's qualities and pushes him/her to their maximum potential. My college gave me the push I needed to stand where I am today running two bootstrapped startups successfully. It taught me how to be a good manager, how to be a good leader and more than that it taught me how to be a generous and conscious human being. Read More Vevek Shah Student of London Business School Christ University has always felt like a home to me, one where you meet so very many heterogeneous people from all across India, and in many cases, the world even. The three years I had the privilege of spending a year, were nothing short of a dream come true. Every single moment spent here was one of personal development and transformation for me, it truly groomed me for what the world has to offer. While the lectures themselves are incredibly informative and interesting - there's so much more to Christ than the academics, and that's for the students to seize. During my time in Christ I was engaged in almost every extra-curricular activity that I felt an interest for - from being the student coordinator for the Synthesize International Conference hosted in collaboration with Arnhem Business School, Netherlands or leading with other final year students in the Entrepreneurship Cell. My time here has been really motivating and telling, the professors here are incredible mentors who guide you every step of the way, all you need to do is ask! And it is certain that any student that passes through the portals of Christ is never the same person that stepped in, they are always more resilient, more holistic and better developed! Read More Michael John Dsouza Analyst : Innsaei Ventures, UK I believe, personally, Christ has taught me a lot. CHRIST UNIVERSITY School of Business and Management Programmes in School of Business and Management Business and Management Hotel Management Tourism Management Business and Management Hotel Management Vision Our Vision is to be an institution of excellence developing leaders serving enterprises and society globally. Mission Our Mission is to develop socially responsible business leaders with the spirit of inquiry through academic and industry engagement. Message from Dean Dr. Jain Mathew MCom, MPhil, PhD Email: dean.management@christuniversity.in Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri Read More × Message from Dean Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri campus – as well as at Pune-Lavasa and Delhi-NCR. Among business schools in India, we are unique in terms of the scale of operations, diversity and representation from all parts of India, as well as offering quality education at a competitive fee structure. Our hallmark is the experiential learning through live projects, internships, service learning, and holistic education through co-curricular and extra-curricular activities. In our MBA program, we provide experiential learning through cases from Harvard and other reputed sources. The curriculum includes research based assignments, and also provides an opportunity for self-learning – which supports the students in lifelong learning. External inputs from corporate executives is an integral part of the pedagogy, thus preparing the students for careers in the industry. Our strong alumni network is a valuable asset in this regard. Our syllabus is updated on an annual basis to stay current in a dynamic environment. The speciality of the School is the development of grounded individuals, with ethical sensitivity and a sense of social responsibility. The faculty – who have a blend of industry and academic experience - stay current through publishing regularly in Scopus indexed and other quality journals. I invite you to peruse the School of Business and Management’s webpages on the portal, which delineate the credentials of our faculty, as well as provide highlights of our activities. The cohort was very diverse that makes you interact and collaborate with so many ethnicities which in the end helps you build a multi-cultural mindset for the future. Also, on a practical front, I was always involved in co-curriculars through festing and clubs which developed my skills that were very useful in my academia as well as my current professional career. × Testimonials Christ (Deemed to be University) is always going to be very close to my heart. I spent my 3 years there learning and making memories that I will cherish for a lifetime. Diversity, Opportunity & practical experience makes this college stand out and it not only offers excellent academic experience but also encourages students to have a more practical and wholesome real life experience through festing, internships and various cultural and management events. Christ University is the place that not only helped me shape my academic and practical skills but also helped develop my over all personality and life skills to a whole new augment. Every faculty member/ professor at Christ has molded and shown the right career path to numerous students successfully and I was lucky enough to have them as my guides in choosing the right career stream. And as our anthem states "Though we change with time, the Christite spirit survives" March on Christites! × Testimonials When I joined Christ university I was in the first Batch for the BBA in Finance and International Business course and part of the first batch to enter the new Bannerghatta campus. The course I selected was structured extremely well and in accordance with international standards. Other than academics christ provided me with opportunities to excel in extracurriculars like business feasting, entrepreneurship cell, sports and cultural events. Christ university also gave me a great platform to develop my leadership skills and gain technical knowledge in my core specialisation with a research focus, that helped me in my Master’s degree and well as my professional career. × Testimonials Christ university was my home away from home. Over the course of 3 years, I had an amazing learning experience which always encouraged me to explore opportunities out of my comfort zone. I gained invaluable first hand experience working with real organizations, experiences which I will continuously draw upon in my future career. CHRIST UNIVERSITY School of Business and Management Programmes in School of Business and Management Business and Management Hotel Management Tourism Management Business and Management Hotel Management Vision Our Vision is to be an institution of excellence developing leaders serving enterprises and society globally. Mission Our Mission is to develop socially responsible business leaders with the spirit of inquiry through academic and industry engagement. Message from Dean Dr. Jain Mathew MCom, MPhil, PhD Email: dean.management@christuniversity.in Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri Read More × Message from Dean Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri campus – as well as at Pune-Lavasa and Delhi-NCR. Among business schools in India, we are unique in terms of the scale of operations, diversity and representation from all parts of India, as well as offering quality education at a competitive fee structure. Our hallmark is the experiential learning through live projects, internships, service learning, and holistic education through co-curricular and extra-curricular activities. In our MBA program, we provide experiential learning through cases from Harvard and other reputed sources. The curriculum includes research based assignments, and also provides an opportunity for self-learning – which supports the students in lifelong learning. External inputs from corporate executives is an integral part of the pedagogy, thus preparing the students for careers in the industry. Our strong alumni network is a valuable asset in this regard. Our syllabus is updated on an annual basis to stay current in a dynamic environment. The speciality of the School is the development of grounded individuals, with ethical sensitivity and a sense of social responsibility. The faculty – who have a blend of industry and academic experience - stay current through publishing regularly in Scopus indexed and other quality journals. I invite you to peruse the School of Business and Management’s webpages on the portal, which delineate the credentials of our faculty, as well as provide highlights of our activities. School Facilities In order to encourage the students to participate in departmental activities, our university gives access to students to make use of the multiple facilities provided in the campus. SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri campus – as well as at Pune-Lavasa and Delhi-NCR. Among business schools in India, we are unique in terms of the scale of operations, diversity and representation from all parts of India, as well as offering quality education at a competitive fee structure. Our hallmark is the experiential learning through live projects, internships, service learning, and holistic education through co-curricular and extra-curricular activities. In our MBA program, we provide experiential learning through cases from Harvard and other reputed sources. The curriculum includes research based assignments, and also provides an opportunity for self-learning – which supports the students in lifelong learning. External inputs from corporate executives is an integral part of the pedagogy, thus preparing the students for careers in the industry. Our strong alumni network is a valuable asset in this regard. Our syllabus is updated on an annual basis to stay current in a dynamic environment. The speciality of the School is the development of grounded individuals, with ethical sensitivity and a sense of social responsibility. The faculty – who have a blend of industry and academic experience - stay current through publishing regularly in Scopus indexed and other quality journals. I invite you to peruse the School of Business and Management’s webpages on the portal, which delineate the credentials of our faculty, as well as provide highlights of our activities. School Facilities In order to encourage the students to participate in departmental activities, our university gives access to students to make use of the multiple facilities provided in the campus. From getting opportunities to participate in quizzes all across the country to honing one's leadership skills, and from academics to assignments, it had it all. A memorable experience indeed! Read More Vishrutha Amudan Geo-Marketer, Zoho Corporation I graduated from Christ University with a Bachelors in Business Administration, specialising in marketing and I am currently working with Zoho Corporation as a Geo-marketer. I remember being fascinated by the beaming energy of the campus as I stepped into the university for the very first time. Christ has something amazing to offer for everyone, what worked for me as a business student was the extensive business festing experience the university offered, sparking my interest in the field of marketing. I strongly believe that the holistic curriculum combined with the scope to explore co-curricular and extra-curricular interests has helped me groom myself into a more confident version of myself, getting me equipped for the 'world of work'. Read More Sathwik Maanthini Founder, Habbit and Homelyfit They say great leaders are not born but are made, and I strongly feel Christ Deemed to be a university is such a place which creates the perfect ambience and exposure that brings out the best of one's qualities and pushes him/her to their maximum potential. My college gave me the push I needed to stand where I am today running two bootstrapped startups successfully. It taught me how to be a good manager, how to be a good leader and more than that it taught me how to be a generous and conscious human being. Read More Vevek Shah Student of London Business School Christ University has always felt like a home to me, one where you meet so very many heterogeneous people from all across India, and in many cases, the world even. The three years I had the privilege of spending a year, were nothing short of a dream come true. Every single moment spent here was one of personal development and transformation for me, it truly groomed me for what the world has to offer. While the lectures themselves are incredibly informative and interesting - there's so much more to Christ than the academics, and that's for the students to seize. During my time in Christ I was engaged in almost every extra-curricular activity that I felt an interest for - from being the student coordinator for the Synthesize International Conference hosted in collaboration with Arnhem Business School, Netherlands or leading with other final year students in the Entrepreneurship Cell. My time here has been really motivating and telling, the professors here are incredible mentors who guide you every step of the way, all you need to do is ask! And it is certain that any student that passes through the portals of Christ is never the same person that stepped in, they are always more resilient, more holistic and better developed! Read More Michael John Dsouza Analyst : Innsaei Ventures, UK I believe, personally, Christ has taught me a lot. The cohort was very diverse that makes you interact and collaborate with so many ethnicities which in the end helps you build a multi-cultural mindset for the future. Also, on a practical front, I was always involved in co-curriculars through festing and clubs which developed my skills that were very useful in my academia as well as my current professional career. Read More Anussha Narain Account Manager Dineout, Times Internet Christ (Deemed to be University) is always going to be very close to my heart. I spent my 3 years there learning and making memories that I will cherish for a lifetime. Diversity, Opportunity & practical experience makes this college stand out and it not only offers excellent academic experience but also encourages students to have a more practical and wholesome real life experience through festing, internships and various cultural and management events. Christ University is the place that not only helped me shape my academic and practical skills but also helped develop my over all personality and life skills to a whole new augment. Every faculty member/ professor at Christ has molded and shown the right career path to numerous students successfully and I was lucky enough to have them as my guides in choosing the right career stream. And as our anthem states "Though we change with time, the Christite spirit survives" March on Christites! Other than academics christ provided me with opportunities to excel in extracurriculars like business feasting, entrepreneurship cell, sports and cultural events. It taught me how to be a good manager, how to be a good leader and more than that it taught me how to be a generous and conscious human being. × Testimonials Christ University has always felt like a home to me, one where you meet so very many heterogeneous people from all across India, and in many cases, the world even. The three years I had the privilege of spending a year, were nothing short of a dream come true. Every single moment spent here was one of personal development and transformation for me, it truly groomed me for what the world has to offer. While the lectures themselves are incredibly informative and interesting - there's so much more to Christ than the academics, and that's for the students to seize. During my time in Christ I was engaged in almost every extra-curricular activity that I felt an interest for - from being the student coordinator for the Synthesize International Conference hosted in collaboration with Arnhem Business School, Netherlands or leading with other final year students in the Entrepreneurship Cell. My time here has been really motivating and telling, the professors here are incredible mentors who guide you every step of the way, all you need to do is ask! And it is certain that any student that passes through the portals of Christ is never the same person that stepped in, they are always more resilient, more holistic and better developed! × Testimonials I believe, personally, Christ has taught me a lot. The cohort was very diverse that makes you interact and collaborate with so many ethnicities which in the end helps you build a multi-cultural mindset for the future. Also, on a practical front, I was always involved in co-curriculars through festing and clubs which developed my skills that were very useful in my academia as well as my current professional career. × Testimonials Christ (Deemed to be University) is always going to be very close to my heart. I spent my 3 years there learning and making memories that I will cherish for a lifetime. Diversity, Opportunity & practical experience makes this college stand out and it not only offers excellent academic experience but also encourages students to have a more practical and wholesome real life experience through festing, internships and various cultural and management events. Christ University is the place that not only helped me shape my academic and practical skills but also helped develop my over all personality and life skills to a whole new augment. Every faculty member/ professor at Christ has molded and shown the right career path to numerous students successfully and I was lucky enough to have them as my guides in choosing the right career stream. And as our anthem states "Though we change with time, the Christite spirit survives" March on Christites! × Testimonials When I joined Christ university I was in the first Batch for the BBA in Finance and International Business course and part of the first batch to enter the new Bannerghatta campus. The course I selected was structured extremely well and in accordance with international standards. Other than academics christ provided me with opportunities to excel in extracurriculars like business feasting, entrepreneurship cell, sports and cultural events. Christ university also gave me a great platform to develop my leadership skills and gain technical knowledge in my core specialisation with a research focus, that helped me in my Master’s degree and well as my professional career. × Testimonials Christ university was my home away from home. Over the course of 3 years, I had an amazing learning experience which always encouraged me to explore opportunities out of my comfort zone. I gained invaluable first hand experience working with real organizations, experiences which I will continuously draw upon in my future career. CHRIST UNIVERSITY School of Business and Management Programmes in School of Business and Management Business and Management Hotel Management Tourism Management Business and Management Hotel Management Vision Our Vision is to be an institution of excellence developing leaders serving enterprises and society globally. Mission Our Mission is to develop socially responsible business leaders with the spirit of inquiry through academic and industry engagement. Message from Dean Dr. Jain Mathew MCom, MPhil, PhD Email: dean.management@christuniversity.in Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri Read More × Message from Dean Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri campus – as well as at Pune-Lavasa and Delhi-NCR. Among business schools in India, we are unique in terms of the scale of operations, diversity and representation from all parts of India, as well as offering quality education at a competitive fee structure. Our hallmark is the experiential learning through live projects, internships, service learning, and holistic education through co-curricular and extra-curricular activities. In our MBA program, we provide experiential learning through cases from Harvard and other reputed sources. The curriculum includes research based assignments, and also provides an opportunity for self-learning – which supports the students in lifelong learning. External inputs from corporate executives is an integral part of the pedagogy, thus preparing the students for careers in the industry. Our strong alumni network is a valuable asset in this regard. Our syllabus is updated on an annual basis to stay current in a dynamic environment. The speciality of the School is the development of grounded individuals, with ethical sensitivity and a sense of social responsibility. The faculty – who have a blend of industry and academic experience - stay current through publishing regularly in Scopus indexed and other quality journals. I invite you to peruse the School of Business and Management’s webpages on the portal, which delineate the credentials of our faculty, as well as provide highlights of our activities. Message from Dean Dr. Jain Mathew MCom, MPhil, PhD Email: dean.management@christuniversity.in Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri Read More × Message from Dean Greetings and welcome to the School of Business and Management (SBM)! SBM offers undergraduate, graduate, and research programs in Management, Hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. We operate from three campuses in Bengaluru – Central campus, Bannerghatta Road Campus (BGR), and Kengeri campus – as well as at Pune-Lavasa and Delhi-NCR. Among business schools in India, we are unique in terms of the scale of operations, diversity and representation from all parts of India, as well as offering quality education at a competitive fee structure. Our hallmark is the experiential learning through live projects, internships, service learning, and holistic education through co-curricular and extra-curricular activities. In our MBA program, we provide experiential learning through cases from Harvard and other reputed sources. The curriculum includes research based assignments, and also provides an opportunity for self-learning – which supports the students in lifelong learning. External inputs from corporate executives is an integral part of the pedagogy, thus preparing the students for careers in the industry. Our strong alumni network is a valuable asset in this regard. Our syllabus is updated on an annual basis to stay current in a dynamic environment. The speciality of the School is the development of grounded individuals, with ethical sensitivity and a sense of social responsibility. The faculty – who have a blend of industry and academic experience - stay current through publishing regularly in Scopus indexed and other quality journals. I invite you to peruse the School of Business and Management’s webpages on the portal, which delineate the credentials of our faculty, as well as provide highlights of our activities. Read More Vevek Shah Student of London Business School Christ University has always felt like a home to me, one where you meet so very many heterogeneous people from all across India, and in many cases, the world even. The three years I had the privilege of spending a year, were nothing short of a dream come true. Every single moment spent here was one of personal development and transformation for me, it truly groomed me for what the world has to offer. While the lectures themselves are incredibly informative and interesting - there's so much more to Christ than the academics, and that's for the students to seize. During my time in Christ I was engaged in almost every extra-curricular activity that I felt an interest for - from being the student coordinator for the Synthesize International Conference hosted in collaboration with Arnhem Business School, Netherlands or leading with other final year students in the Entrepreneurship Cell. My time here has been really motivating and telling, the professors here are incredible mentors who guide you every step of the way, all you need to do is ask! And it is certain that any student that passes through the portals of Christ is never the same person that stepped in, they are always more resilient, more holistic and better developed!
